title: Another Study Shows No Link Between MMR Vaccine and Autism
author: Jeanne Whalen
description: Following a measles outbreak in California fueled by vaccination fears that scientists call unfounded, another large study has shown no link between the measles-mumps-rubella vaccine and autism.
cleaned_text: April 21, 2015 11:03 am ET On the heels of a measles outbreak in California fueled by vaccination fears that scientists call unfounded, another large study has shown no link between the measles-mumps-rubella vaccine and autism.
